title: The Skilled Hawk Hides His Crime

infobox.Title:: The Skilled Hawk Hides His Crime
infobox.Japanese title:: 能ある鷹は罪を隠す  (Nō Aru Taka wa Tsumi o Kakusu)
infobox.English title:: The Skilled Hawk Hides His Crimes
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Kogoro Mouri  Ran Mouri Juzo Megure  Wataru Takagi
infobox.Animation director:: Seiji Muta and Nobuyuki Iwai (supervisors)  Keiko Sasaki
infobox.Character design:: Masatomo Sudo  Rei Masunaga (sub-character)  Hiroshi Ogawa (design works)
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Rikiya Koyama as Kogoro Mouri  Wakana Yamazaki as Ran Mouri  Chafurin as Juzo Megure  Wataru Takagi as Wataru Takagi  Eiji Yanagisawa as Real Estate Agent  Juri Kimura as Reporter  Daisuke Takahashi as Announcer  Shunsuke Sakuya as Genichi Takehara  Yutaka Aoyama as Tetsu Akashiba  Minoru Inaba as Masahiko Ishima  Aya Hisakawa as Satoko Takehara

sections.Situation:
Conan, Kogoro, and Ran are in the mountains when they see a hawk, Kogoro disturb the hawk but is stopped by a falconer called Tetsu Akashiba. He yells angrily at him to be careful with hawks. Later, they are at Takehara Cafe, a cafe managed by Genichi Takehara and his wife Satoko, where a festival is being held. They also meet a local farmer called Masahiko Ishima who made puffed rice. The cafe owner later goes hunting boar. The main event of the festival is sending the hawk to a target. When the hawk is arriving to the target, the hawk suddenly falls down and a gunshot is heard. They found Genichi Takehara dead.

The police arrives and investigates. It seems to be an accident, but is this true? After finding a few clues, Conan discovers the culprit and the trick behind this murder.

- 37 years old
- Takehara café owner
- Akashiba's hawk
- Real Estate agent
- News reporter
sections.Trivia: - The title is adapted from a Japanese idiom "a talented hawk hides its claws" (能ある鷹は爪を隠す). Often used to describe people with talented abilities that don't render them casually.
